channel.title: Categories on Tokyo Adachi Roshukai UK
channel.description: Recent content in Categories on Tokyo Adachi Roshukai UK

item.title: Edinburgh
item.description: Located in the heart of Edinburgh this popular dojo is run by David Hickey and Matt Bielby.

item.title: Glasgow
item.description: Kensaki iaido dojo is Scotland's oldest school of the Japanese sword and was founded in 1973 by Sam McKay, but is now run by Robert Boyd.

item.title: Borders
item.description: David McLean runs the borders dojo located in Leitholm near Coldstream.

item.title: Sussex
item.description: Sussex has 2 dojo one in West Sussex and the other in East Sussex.
